header.title: Trading cockpit
header.aethb-info: aETHb is an ETH reward earning bond.

fair-value.title: Fair Value
fair-value.tooltip: The fair value represents the ratio at which users can stake/unstake one token. For reward-earning (rebasing) tokens, the value should always be 1 to 1 because user's wallet balance increase in a daily basis, simulating as such earned staking rewards.
fair-value.tooltip-aethc: The fair value represents the staking value of 1 aETHc, which should always increase and be above 1 ETH as ETH2 staking rewards are accumulated in Ankr's staking pool. At phase 1.5 of Ethereum 2.0, unstaking ETH will become possible and staked ETH can be redeemed at fair value.

table.name: Name
table.difference-tip: This indicates the difference between market price and fair value, which is the amount of tokens received when you stake/unstake.
table.est-price-tip: Price difference in comparison with the best price that you can get.

stats.apy-tooltip: Annual percentage yield (or APY) shows the rate of return you earn over a year including the effect of compounding.

success.title: Stake successful
success.description: You will be able to see your {token} exposure on Ankr Earn Dashboard.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question-1: Are there any docs about the BNB staking and how I set up my wallet etc.?
faq.answer-1: Yes – there’s a user guide you can find here.
faq.question-2: What is the minimum amount of BNB I can stake?
faq.question-3: What is the unbonding period of aBNBb?
faq.answer-4: aBNBb is a rebasing token. When holding aBNBb, your balance will increase in proportion to your BNB staking rewards. A rebase runs daily, and rewards occur each time this runs. So each day, you will see the quantity of your aBNBb increase by a small amount.
faq.question-5: How soon after staking will I begin to receive rewards?
faq.answer-5: aBNBb will increase with every rebase; rebasing occurs daily.
faq.question-6: Does Ankr charge for this service?
faq.answer-6: ANKR does not charge any service fees for BNB Liquid Staking. However, validators charge a delegate stake fee (Ankr’s validator node charges 2%), representing an indirect cost for liquid staking token holders. Ankr's income comes from running one of the several validator nodes that will be used to stake BNB.
faq.question-7: What determines the amount of reward I receive each rebase?
faq.answer-7: Staking rewards depend mostly on the voting power of the validator node that your stake is delegated to. Ankr aims to spread delegations to only the most trustworthy and reliable nodes to increase staking rewards.
faq.question-8: Is there any risk from staking, like slashing or any penalties?
faq.answer-8: The only risk for stakers is missing out on rewards during any time the validator their BNB is staked with is “in jail” (slashed). However, delegated staked BNB will not be slashed, and slashing impacts only the self-stake of the validator. Ankr only delegates to trusted and reputable validator nodes to avoid any validator that would act maliciously.
faq.question-9: Is there any liquidity for aBNBb anywhere currently?
faq.answer-9: You can check all available DeFi platforms and options on ANKR Boost.

stake-bnb.stake-info: Stake at least 1 BNB on Ethereum network and claim the same amount of aBNBb liquid staking tokens (aBNBb) on Binance Smart Chain network (BEP-20 token). Your aBNBb balance will increase on a daily basis, simulating as such your aBNBb staking rewards.

tooltips.relayer-fee: As staking itself going on Binance chain unlike BNB on Binance Smart Chain you stake, we have to do cross-chain transfer and pay fee for this.
tooltips.you-will-get:
aBNBb grows daily just being in your wallet. It represents your staked BNB plus accumulated staking rewards.

It can be redeemed at fair value 1 aBNBb = 1 BNB anytime after ~{value} {period} unbonding period.

stake-bnb-dashboard.title: BNB Staking

tooltip.apy:
The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) represents the average annualized earned BNB over the last 7 days, net of delegation fees from Binance Validator nodes.

Ankr Earn fee is 0%.

When there are at least 300 pending BNB rewards, earned BNB will be staked to generate compounding effect.
tooltip.fee: As unstaking BNB tokens is a gas and time consuming process requiring sending several transactions to the BNB smart-contracts deployed in Ethereum, Ankr Earn covers the gas fee cost and charge a modest fee in Ankr to compensate its expenses. BNB tokens will therefore be transfered to your wallet automatically as soon as unstake process is completed without any subsequent additional costs.

stake-bnb-dashboard.unstake-info: You will receive BNB in about ~{value} {period}.

stake-polygon-dashboard.title: MATIC Staking
stake-polygon-dashboard.unstake-eta: You will receive MATIC in about 3-4 days.

tooltip.apy:
The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) represents the average annualized earned MATIC over the last 7 days, net of delegation fees from Polygon Validator nodes.

Ankr Earn fee is 0%.

When there are at least 300 pending MATIC rewards, earned MATIC will be staked to generate compounding effect.
tooltip.fee: As unstaking MATIC tokens is a gas and time consuming process requiring sending several transactions to the MATIC smart-contracts deployed in Ethereum, Ankr Earn covers the gas fee cost and charge a modest fee in Ankr to compensate its expenses.  MATIC tokens will therefore be transfered to your wallet automatically as soon as unstake process is completed without any subsequent additional costs.

validation.is-not-enough-fee: {value} ANKR is not enough for unstaking fee. Please, buy ANKR

stake-polygon.stake-info: Stake at least 1 MATIC on Ethereum network and claim the same amount of aMATICb liquid staking tokens (aMATICb) on Ethereum network (ERC-20 token). Your aMATICb balance will increase on a daily basis, simulating as such your aMATICb staking rewards.
stake-polygon.matic-tooltip-body:
aMATICb grows daily just being in your wallet. It represents your staked MATIC plus accumulated staking rewards.

It can be redeemed at fair value 1 aMATICb = 1 MATIC anytime after 3-4 days unbonding period.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.answer-1: Polygon Liquid Staking offers instant liquidity for your staked MATIC. When you stake MATIC, you will mint and claim aMATICb tokens. These new tokens can be used with DeFi platforms to earn additional layers of rewards.
faq.question-2: What is the minimum amount of MATIC I can stake?
faq.answer-2: The minimum amount you can stake is {value} MATIC.
faq.question-3: How soon after staking will I begin to receive rewards?
faq.answer-3: Your aMATICb balance will increase daily with every rebase. This rebase reflects the staking rewards you have earned for the period.
faq.answer-4: The aMATICb tokens you keep in your wallet will gradually increase in quantity to reflect the staking rewards you earn. This happens daily with a process called “rebasing” (adjusting the supply of tokens) to deliver your appropriate staking rewards.
faq.question-5: What determines the amount of reward I receive with each rebase?
faq.answer-5: This depends on the average staking period of Ankr Earn validator nodes, as well as MATIC total supply and size of the future instant liquidity pool (an indirect cost for aMATICb holders).
faq.question-6: If I unstake, is there a lead time required for this to happen, or is it immediate?
faq.answer-6: You will need to wait for a period of around 3-4 days. This is because the blockchain needs to undergo 80 “checkpoints” to process this transaction.
faq.question-7: Are there any docs about the MATIC staking and how I set up my wallet etc.?
faq.answer-7: Yes, you can access a more in-depth user guide here.

stake-fantom.aftmb-tooltip:
aFTMb grows daily just being in your wallet. It represents your staked FTM plus accumulated staking rewards.

It can be redeemed at fair value 1 aFTMb = 1 FTM anytime after 3-4 days unbonding period.

faq.question-1: Are there any docs about the FTM staking and how I set up my wallet etc.?
faq.answer-1: Yes – there’s a user guide you can find here.
faq.question-2: What is the minimum amount of FTM I can stake?
faq.question-3: What is the unstaking period of aFTMb?
faq.answer-3: The unstaking period is a maximum of {days} days. Every {days} days, there is at least one validator node reaching the end of its locking period. The cost of unstaking aFTMb can vary depending on the availability of FTM in the closest maturing node to avoid any liquidity risk.
faq.answer-4: aFTMb is a rebasing token. When holding aFTMb, your balance will increase in proportion to your FTM staking rewards. A rebase runs daily, and rewards occur each time this runs. So every day, you can see that the quantity of your aFTMb has increased by a small amount.
faq.question-5: How soon after staking will I begin to receive rewards?
faq.answer-5: Your aFTMb balance will increase with every rebase; rebasing occurs daily.
faq.question-6: Does Ankr charge for this service?
faq.answer-6: Ankr does not charge any service fees for Fantom Liquid Staking. However, validators charge a delegate stake fee of 15%, representing an indirect cost for liquid staking token holders. Ankr's income comes from running one of the several validator nodes that will be used to stake FTM.
faq.question-7: What determines the amount of rewards that I receive through rebase?
faq.answer-7:
Staking rewards depend mostly on how long your staked FTM is locked with Ankr Earn.
Staking FTM without locking provides approximately 4.5% rewards, or about 14% when locking for 365 days. You can find the most updated information about FTM staking rewards by locking period here.
Ankr will aim to delegate 50% of staked FTM for the maximum possible period (approx. 1 year), 25% for 28 days, and 25% for 56 days.
aFTMb holders will therefore get the average staking rewards of all staked FTM through Ankr Earn.
faq.question-8: Is there any risk from Liquid staking, like slashing or any penalties?
faq.answer-8: If a validator node acts maliciously, delegators will also be slashed as this is an essential part of the Fantom network’s security. Ankr only delegates to trusted and reputable validator nodes to avoid any validator that would act maliciously.
faq.question-9: Is there liquidity for aFTMb anywhere currently?
faq.answer-9: You can check all available DeFi platforms and options on ANKR Boost.

stake-ethereum.aethb-tooltip:
aETHb is a reward earning bond, meaning that the staking reward distribution is simulated through rebasing.

In other words, by holding aETHb, you can see your aETHb balance increasing on a daily basis.
stake-ethereum.aethc-tooltip: With aETHc, rewards are built in to the token price, so as time passes, the token becomes more valuable. Once Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1.5 is released, you can redeem your aETHc for your original ETH plus accumulated rewards.

eth2Swap.title: ETH2 Swap
eth2Swap.info: Swap ETH liquid staking tokens at fair value any time.

tooltips.aETHb: Ankr Reward-Earning Staked ETH (aETHb) is a rebasing token. When holding aETHb, its balance will increase on a daily basis proportional to your ETH2 staking rewards. Therefore, the ratio of aETHb vs. ETH is always 1:1.
tooltips.aETHc: Ankr Reward-Bearing Staked ETH (aETHc) is a reward-bearing token.Its value compared with ETH represents the redemption value of aETHc, increasing over time to reflect ETH2 staking rewards earned.

eth2Swap.successInfo: Check out your new {token} exposure on the Ankr Earn Dashboard any time.

unstake-dialog.title: How many {token} do you want to redeem?
unstake-dialog.unstake-fee-tooltip: As unstaking MATIC tokens is a gas and time consuming process requiring sending several transactions to the MATIC smart contracts deployed in Ethereum. Ankr Earn covers all gas fees while charging users a modest fee in ANKR tokens to compensate expenses. MATIC tokens will be transferred to your wallet automatically when the unstaking process is complete with no additional costs.
